meetingCreation.CREATION_START_RESPONSE_DESCRIPTION: I've sent you a Direct Message! Head over to your DMs to create a new Meeting!
meetingCreation.CREATION_START_OPEN_PRIVATE_FAILED: I could not send you a direct message. Please change your privacy settings to allow DMs from server members.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_TIMED_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Due to prolonged inactivity the current Process has been canceled.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_NO_TRIES_LEFT_DESCRIPTION: You've no more tries left. The current action has been discarded. Please try again.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_1_DESCRIPTION:
Hey %s,
Please choose the **Server** the Meeting should happen in.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_1_SUCCESS_EPHEMERAL: `%s` has been set as the default server.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_2_DESCRIPTION:
Alright, we're planning a new Meeting for `%s`.
Please choose the Meeting's **Language** in the Selection Menu down below.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_2_SELECTION_MENU_DESCRI: This will set the meeting's language to: %s
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_2_SUCCESS_EPHEMERAL: `%s` has been set as the default language.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_3_DESCRIPTION:
`%s` it is!
Please choose the **Date and Time** the Meeting should start.
Please format the date like this: `dd/MM/YYYY HH:mm` (UTC) (e.g. 13/09/2019 13:05)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_3_INVALID_DATE:
You've provided an invalid date. Please try again. (%s tries left)
Please format the date like this: `dd/MM/YYYY HH:mm` (UTC) (e.g. 13/09/2019 13:05)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_4_DESCRIPTION:
Alright, the Meeting will start at <t:%s:F>!
Please provide a **Title** for this Meeting. (max. 64 characters)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_4_INVALID_TITLE: The given Title was longer than 64 characters. Please try again. (%s tries left)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_5_DESCRIPTION:
The Meetings Title has been set to `%s`.
Please provide a fitting **Description** for this Meeting. (max. 256 characters)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_5_INVALID_TITLE: The given Description was longer than 256 characters. Please try again. (%s tries left)
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_6_DESCRIPTION: Alright, all set! Your Meeting will look like this:
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_6_PROCESS_CANCELED: All your settings have been discarded.
meetingCreation.CREATION_DM_STEP_6_MEETING_SAVED: Your Meeting was saved. I've created a Log Channel for your Meeting: %s
